72078: The @deva[सार्वधातुक] affixes @deva[से] and @deva[ध्वे] (the endings of the Present and Imperative @deva[आत्मनेपदि]) get the augment @deva[इट्] after the roots @deva[ईड्] - @deva[अदादिगणः] (2nd Conjugation) and @deva[जन्] 'to produce'.
72079: In the @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[लिङ्] (Potential) the @deva[स्] which is not final (i.e. the @deva[स्] of the augments @deva[यास्] and @deva[सीय्] ) is elided.
72080: After a Present @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in a short @deva[अ] , @deva[इय्] is substituted for the @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[या] (i.e. for the @deva[या] of the augment @deva[यास्] of the @deva[लिङ्] (Potential)).
72081: For the @deva[आ] being a portion of a @deva[सार्वधातुक] personal-ending which is @deva[ङित्] (i.e. @deva[आते] , @deva[आथे] and @deva[आताम्] and @deva[आथाम्]), coming after a verbal @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in a short @deva[अ] , there is substituted @deva[इय्] ।
72082: Before the participial ending @deva[आन] , a verbal @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in shot @deva[अ] , gets the augment @deva[मुक्]।
72083: @deva[ई] is substituted for the @deva[आ] of @deva[आन] after @deva[आस्]।
72084: @deva[आ] is substituted for the final of @deva[अष्टन्] before a case-ending.
72085: Before a case-ending beginning with a consonant, @deva[आ] is substituted for the final of @deva[रै]।
72086: @deva[आ] is substituted for the final of @deva[युष्मद्] and @deva[अस्मद्] before a case-ending.
72087: @deva[आ] is substituted for the final of @deva[युष्मद्] and @deva[अस्मद्] before the case-ending of the Accusative -2nd case.
72088: @deva[आ] is substituted for the final of @deva[युष्मद्] and @deva[अस्मद्] before the case-ending of the Nominative 1st-Case dual in the secular literature.
72089: @deva[य] is substituted for the final of @deva[युष्मद्] and @deva[अस्मद्] before a case-ending which is not a substitute and which begins with a vowel.
72090: In the remaining cases where (@deva[आ] or @deva[य] is not substituted) there is elision of the final @deva[युष्मद्] and @deva[अस्मद्]।
72091: The substitutions taught hereafter up to @deva[प्रतयोत्तरपदयोश्च] @ref[7.2.98] take effect with regard to the portions of @deva[युष्मद्] and @deva[अस्मद्] up to @deva[म्] i.e. the substitutes replace @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[अस्म्]।
72092: In the dual, @deva[युव] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[आव] for @deva[अस्म्]।
72093: In the Nominative 1st-Case plural @deva[यूय] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[वय] for @deva[अस्म्]।
72094: In the Nominative 1st-Case singular @deva[त्व] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[अह] for @deva[अस्म्]।
72095: In the Dative -4th Case singular @deva[तुभ्य] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[मह्य] for @deva[अस्म्]।
72096: In the Genitive 6th-Case singular @deva[तव] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[मम] for @deva[अस्म्]।
72097: In the remaining cases of the singular @deva[त्व] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[म] for @deva[अस्म्]।
72098: @deva[त्व] is substituted for @deva[युष्म्] and @deva[म] for @deva[अस्म्] when they signify a single individual, even when an affix follows or a word is in composition.
72099: @deva[तिसृ] is substituted for @deva[त्रि] and @deva[चतसृ] for @deva[चतुर्] in the feminine when a case-ending follows.
72100: @deva[र्] is substituted for @deva[ऋ] of @deva[तिसृ] and @deva[चतसृ] before the case-affixes beginning with a vowel.
72101: @deva[जरस्] may be substituted for @deva[जरा] , optionally before a case-affix beginning with a vowel.
72102: For the final of @deva[त्यद्] etc. there is substituted @deva[अ] when an affix called @deva[विभक्ति] follows.
72103: @deva[क] is substituted for @deva[किम्] before a @deva[विभक्ति] affix.
72104: @deva[कु] is substituted for @deva[किम्] before a @deva[विभक्ति] affix beginning with a @deva[त] or @deva[ह]।
72106: For the non-final @deva[त्] and @deva[द्] of @deva[त्यद्] etc. there is substituted @deva[स्] in the Nominative 1st-Case singular.
72107: For the @deva[स्] of @deva[अदस्] there is substituted @deva[औ] whereby the Nominative 1st-Case singular affix @deva[सु] is elided.
72108: @deva[म्] is substituted for the final @deva[म्] of @deva[इदम्] in the Nominative 1st-Case singular.
72109: @deva[म्] is substituted for the @deva[द्] of @deva[इदम्] before a @deva[विभक्ति] affix.
72110: @deva[म्] is substituted for the @deva[द्] of @deva[इदम्] before a @deva[विभक्ति] affix.
72111: @deva[अय्] is substituted for the @deva[इद्] of @deva[इदम्] in the Nominative 1st-Case singular masculine.
72112: @deva[अन] is substituted for the @deva[इद्] of @deva[इदम्] in the Instrumental -3rd case singular and the cases that follow, provided that the augment @deva[अकच्] is not added.
72113: The @deva[इद्] of @deva[इदम्] is elided before a @deva[विभक्ति] affix beginning with a consonant.
72114: The @deva[वृद्धि] (@deva[आर्]) is substituted for the root vowel (@deva[ऋ]) of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) @deva[मृज्] before an affix.
72115: Before the affixes having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्] , @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the end-vowel of a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem).
72116: In a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in a consonant with an @deva[अ] immediately preceding it, the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for such @deva[अ] when followed by an indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्]।
72117: The @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) when a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्] follows.
72118: The @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) when a @deva[तद्धित] affix with an indicatory @deva[क्] follows.
73001: When a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] follows, @deva[आ] is substituted instead of @deva[वृद्धि] for the first vowels of the following - 1. @deva[देविका] 2. @deva[शिंशपा] 3. @deva[दित्यवाट्] 4. @deva[दीर्घसत्र] and 5. @deva[श्रेयस]।
73002: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] the @deva[वृद्धि] is not substituted for the first vowel in a compound when it follows a word ending in @deva[य्] or @deva[व्] but @deva[ऐ] and @deva[औ] are respectively placed before the semi-vowels.
73003: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix with an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] the @deva[वृद्धि] is not substituted for the first vowel in a compound when it follows a word ending in @deva[य्] or @deva[व्] but @deva[ऐ] and @deva[औ] are respectively placed before the semi-vowels.
73004: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix with an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] the @deva[वृद्धि] is not substituted for the first vowel after @deva[य्] or @deva[व्] but @deva[ऐ] and @deva[औ] are respectively placed before the semi-vowels in @deva[द्वार] etc.
73005: @deva[ऐ] is placed before the @deva[य्] of @deva[न्यग्रोध] instead of @deva[वृद्धि] when the word stands alone and is not a member of a compound and is followed by a @deva[तद्धित] affix with the indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73006: The prohibition and the augment ordained by @deva[न] @deva[य्वाभ्यां] @deva[पदान्ताभ्याम्] @deva[पूर्वौ] @deva[तु] @deva[ताभ्यामैच्] @ref[7.3.3], do not apply to a word which expresses the reciprocity of an action.
73007: The prohibition and the augment ordained by @deva[न] @deva[य्वाभ्यां] @deva[पदान्ताभ्याम्] @deva[पूर्वौ] @deva[तु] @deva[ताभ्यामैच्] @ref[7.3.3], do not apply also to @deva[स्वागत] etc.
73008: A compound beginning with @deva[श्वन्] and followed by the @deva[तद्धित] affix @deva[इञ्] is not governed by the prohibition nor takes the augment taught in @deva[द्वारादीनां] @deva[च] @ref[7.3.4].
73009: The sūtra @deva[द्वारादीनां] @deva[च] @ref[7.3.4] is optionally applied to @deva[श्वन्] followed by @deva[पद]।
73010: Up to @deva[यथातथयथापुरयोः] @deva[पर्यायेण] @ref[7.3.31] inclusive, the substitution of @deva[वृद्धि] will take place for the first vowel of the second member in a compound.
73011: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of a word denoting season when it is preceded by a word denoting a part.
73012: After 1. @deva[सु] 2. @deva[सर्व] and 3. @deva[अर्ध] the first vowel of the name of a country gets the @deva[वृद्धि] when a @deva[तद्धित] affix with an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] follows.
73013: After a word denoting direction, the first vowel of the name of a country with the exception of @deva[मद्र] gets @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73014: After a word denoting direction, the first vowel of the name of a village or city in the land of the Eastern people, gets the @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73015: After a numeral, the first vowel of @deva[संवत्सर] and of a numeral, gets @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73016: After a numeral, the first vowel of @deva[वर्ष] gets @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] when the affix does not refer to a Future time.
73017: After a numeral, the first vowel of a word denoting mass in its widest sense (with the exception of @deva[शाण]) gets the @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] when the word so formed does not mean a Name.
73018: In @deva[प्रोष्ठपद] and its synonyms, the first vowel of the second member gets the @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix meaning 'born in that time' and having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73019: The @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowels of both (the first and second) members in a compound ending with 1. @deva[हृद्] 2. @deva[भग] and 3. @deva[सिन्धु] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73020: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] , the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of both members of the compounds @deva[अनुशतिका] etc.
73021: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] , the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowels of both members of @deva[द्वन्द] @deva[समास] of the names of @deva[देवता]-s।
73022: But the @deva[वृद्धि] of the first vowel of @deva[इन्द्र] when it stands as the second member of a @deva[द्वन्द] @deva[समास] , does not take place before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] ।
73023: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] in a @deva[द्वन्द] @deva[समास] of god-names, the @deva[वृद्धि] is not substituted for the first vowel of @deva[वरुण] when a long vowel precedes it.
73024: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowels of both members of the compound which is the name of a city of the Eastern people and which ends in the word @deva[नगर]।
73025: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of the compound ending in 1. @deva[जङ्गल] 2. @deva[धेनु] and 3. @deva[बलज] and optionally for the first vowel of these second members also.
73026: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of the second member, denoting a mass in its widest sense when the word @deva[अर्ध] precedes it, but optionally for the first vowel of @deva[अर्ध]।
73027: When the first vowel of the second member preceded by @deva[अर्ध] and denoting mass is short @deva[अ] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] and optionally so for the first vowel of the first member (i.e. @deva[अर्ध]).
73028: Before the affix @deva[ढ] (@deva[एय]), the @deva[वृद्धि] is substituted for the first vowel of the second member of @deva[प्रवाहण] but optionally so for the first member (i.e. @deva[प्र]).
73029: Even so from a new derivative from this stem ending in @deva[ढ], formed with a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] there is @deva[वृद्धि] substitution for the first vowel of the second member and optionally for the first vowel of the first member in @deva[प्रवाहणेय] and @deva[प्रावाहणेय]।
73030: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] , the @deva[वृद्धि] is always substituted for the first vowel of 1. @deva[शुचि] 2. @deva[ईश्वर] 3. @deva[क्षेत्रज्ञ] 4. @deva[कुशल] and 4. @deva[निपुण] when preceded by the Negative particle, but this substitution is optional for the vowel of the Negative particles.
73031: Before a @deva[तद्धित] affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] , @deva[ण्] or @deva[क्] , the words @deva[यथातथ] and @deva[यथापुर] may have @deva[वृद्धि] of the first vowel of their first member or that of the second member, in alteration.
73032: @deva[त्] is substituted for the @deva[न्] of the root @deva[हन्] 'to kill' before an affix with a indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्] which also causes @deva[वृद्धि] of the penultimate @deva[अ] , but the augment is not added before the Aorist sign nor before the Personal ending @deva[णल्] of the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
73033: A root-@deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in @deva[आ] gets the augment @deva[युक्] (@deva[य्]) before the Aorist sign @deva[चिण्] which causes also the @deva[वृद्धि] of the root-vowel.
73034: The @deva[वृद्धि] is not substituted before the Aorist sign @deva[चिण्] or a @deva[कृत्] affix with an indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्] for the vowel of that root which ends in @deva[म] and is acutely accented (@deva[उदात्त]) in its original enunciation (@deva[धातुपाठ]), but not so in @deva[चम्] after @deva[आ]।
73035: The @deva[वृद्धि] is not substituted for the vowels of @deva[जन्] 'to produce' and @deva[वधे] before the Aorist sign @deva[चिण्] and the @deva[कृत्] affixes with an indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्] ।
73036: The augment @deva[पुक्] (@deva[प्]) is added to the roots 1. @deva[ऋ] 2. @deva[ह्री] 3. @deva[व्ली] 4. @deva[री] 5. @deva[क्नुय्] 6. @deva[क्ष्माय] and to a root ending in long @deva[आ] when the affix @deva[णि] (the Causative) follows.
73037: The augment @deva[युक्] (@deva[य्]) is added to the verbal stems 1. @deva[शा] 2. @deva[छा] 3. @deva[सा] 4. @deva[ह्वा] 5. @deva[वे] and 6. @deva[पा] before the affix @deva[णि] (Causative).
73038: @deva[वा] gets the augment @deva[जुक्] (@deva[ज्]) before the affix @deva[णि] when the Causative has the sense of 'shaking'.
73039: The roots @deva[ली] and @deva[ला] optionally get @deva[नुक्] and @deva[लुक्] augment respectively before the affix @deva[णि] when the Causative means 'the melting of a fatty substance'.
73040: The augment @deva[षुक्] is added to the root @deva[भी] before the affix @deva[णि] when fear is caused immediately owing to the agent of the Causative.
73041: For the final of the stem @deva[स्फाय्] is substituted @deva[व्] in the Causative.
73042: For the final of @deva[शद्] is substituted @deva[त्] in the Causative, when it does not mean 'to drive'.
73043: @deva[प्] may optionally be substituted for the final of @deva[रुह्] 'to mount' in the Causative.
73044: @deva[इ] is substituted for the @deva[अ] which stands before the @deva[क्] belonging to an affix when the feminine ending @deva[आ] follows, provided that, it does not come after a case-affix (i.e. when such a word in @deva[अक] does not stand at the end of a @deva[बहुव्रीहि] @deva[समास]).
73045: The @deva[इ] is not substituted for the @deva[अ] of @deva[य्] and @deva[स्] with the augment @deva[क्] when the feminine @deva[आ] follows.
73046: According to the opinion of Northern Grammarians @deva[इ] is not substituted for that @deva[अ] which is obtained by shortening the long @deva[आ] of the feminine (under sūtra @deva[केऽणः] @ref[7.4.13] before the affix @deva[क]) which is preceded by @deva[य्] or a @deva[क्]।
73047: According to the opinion of Northern Grammarians @deva[इ] is not substituted for that @deva[अ] which is obtained by shortening the long @deva[आ] of the feminine (under sūtra @deva[केऽणः] @ref[7.4.13]) of 1. @deva[भस्त्रा] 2. @deva[एषा] 3. @deva[अजा] 4. @deva[ज्ञा] 5. @deva[द्वा] -- @deva[त्यदादीनामः] @ref[7.2.102], and 6. @deva[स्वा] even not then when the negative particle precedes them.
73048: According to the opinion of Northern Grammarians @deva[इ] is not substituted for that @deva[अ] which is obtained by shortening the long @deva[आ] of the feminine (under sūtra @deva[केऽणः] @ref[7.4.13]) when to the feminine in long @deva[आ] there is no equivalent masculine, even when the negative particle precedes.
73049: According to the opinion of other Teachers, @deva[आ] is substituted for the which is obtained by shortening the long @deva[आ] of the feminine (under sūtra @deva[केऽणः] @ref[7.4.13]) of a word which has no corresponding masculine form.
73050: For @deva[ठ] at the beginning of a @deva[तद्धित] affix there is substituted @deva[इक्]।
73051: @deva[क] is substituted for @deva[ठ] after a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in 1. @deva[इस्] 2. @deva[उस्] 3. @deva[उ] or @deva[ऊ] 4. @deva[ॠ] and 5. @deva[त्]।
73052: For the final @deva[च्] or @deva[ज्] of a root, there is substituted a corresponding guttural, before an affix having an indicatory @deva[ध्] and before @deva[ण्यत्]।
73053: The guttural is substituted in @deva[न्यङ्क्वु] etc..
73054: A guttural is substituted for the @deva[ह्] in @deva[हन्] 'to kill' before an affix having an indicatory @deva[ञ्] or @deva[ण्] and before @deva[न्]।
73055: A guttural is substituted for the @deva[ह्] in @deva[हन्] 'to kill' after reduplication also.
73056: A guttural is substituted for the @deva[ह्] of @deva[हि] (@deva[हिनोति]) after a reduplication, but not in the reduplicated Aorist.
73057: @deva[ज्] in @deva[जि] 'to conquer' after a reduplication before the Desiderative affix @deva[सन्] and in the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
73058: A guttural is optionally substituted for the @deva[च्] of @deva[चि] 'to collect' after a reduplication in Desiderative and @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
73059: A guttural is not substituted for the final @deva[च्] or @deva[ज्] of a root which begins with a guttural, before the affix having an indicatory @deva[ध्] and before @deva[ण्यत्]।
73060: A guttural is not substituted for the final @deva[ज्] of @deva[अज्] and @deva[व्रज्] before an affix having an indicatory @deva[ध्] and before @deva[ण्यत्]।
73061: @deva[भुज] 'an arm' and @deva[न्युब्ज] 'a kind of bodily disease' are irregularly formed without any change of their @deva[ज्] before @deva[घञ्]।
73062: @deva[प्रयाज] and @deva[अनुयाज] are irregularly formed with @deva[घञ्] when meaning 'a portion of a sacrificial offering'.
73063: A guttural is not substituted for the palatal of @deva[वञ्च्] in the sense of 'going'.
73064: @deva[ओक] is irregularly formed from the root @deva[उच्] with the affix @deva[क] (@deva[अ]).
73065: A guttural is not substituted for the palatal before the affix @deva[ण्य] when it means 'to do as absolute necessity'.
73066: A guttural is not substituted for the final palatals of 1. @deva[यज्] 2. @deva[याच्] 3. @deva[रुच्] 4. @deva[प्र-वच्] and 5. @deva[ऋच्] before the affix @deva[ण्यत्]।
73067: A guttural is not substituted for the final of @deva[वच्] before @deva[ण्यत्] when it does not mean 'a word or speech'.
73068: @deva[प्रयोज्य] and @deva[नियोज्य] preserve their palatal in the sense of 'capable to do this'.
73069: @deva[भोज्य] preserves its palatal in the sense of 'eatable'.
73070: The final of @deva[दा] and @deva[धा] (@deva[धु] roots) may optionally be elided in the @deva[लेट्] (Vedic Subjunctive).
73071: A @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in @deva[ओ] loses its final before the Present characteristic @deva[श्यन्] of the @deva[दिवादिगणः] (4th Conjugation).
73072: The @deva[अ] of the Aorist characteristic @deva[कस्] is elided before an affix beginning with a vowel.
73073: The whole of the affix @deva[कस्] is optionally elided before the personal endings of @deva[आत्मनेपद] beginning with a dental, after 1. @deva[दुह्] 2. @deva[दिह्] 3. @deva[लिह्] and 4. @deva[गुह्]।
73074: Before the Present characteristic @deva[श्यन्] , a long is substituted for the root-vowel in @deva[शम्] and the seven roots that follow it.
73075: Before any other Present character (@deva[शित्]) the root vowel of 1. @deva[ष्ठिव्] 2. @deva[क्लम्] and 3.@deva[आ-चम्] is lengthened.
73076: The long is substituted in @deva[क्रम्] before a @deva[शित्] affix, in the @deva[परस्मैपद] ।
73077: @deva[छ्] is substituted for the final of 1. @deva[इष्] 2. @deva[गम्] and 3. @deva[यम्] before a Present-character (@deva[शित्]).
73078: Before a Present-character (@deva[शित्]) the following substitutions take place - 1. @deva[पिब्] for @deva[पा] 2. @deva[जिघ्र] for @deva[घ्रा] 3. @deva[धम्] for @deva[ध्मा] 4. @deva[तिष्ठ्] for @deva[स्था] 5. @deva[मन्] for @deva[म्ना] 6. @deva[यछ्] for @deva[दा] (@deva[दाण्]) 7. @deva[पश्य] for @deva[दृश्] 8. @deva[ऋच्छ्] for @deva[ऋ] 9. @deva[धौ] for @deva[सृ] 10. @deva[शीय्] for @deva[शद्] and 11. @deva[सीद्] for @deva[सद्]।
73079: Before a @deva[शित्] affix, @deva[जा] is substituted for @deva[ज्ञा] and @deva[जन्]।
73080: A short is substituted for @deva[पू] etc. before a @deva[शित्] affix.
73081: In the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas) @deva[मी] is shortened before a @deva[शित्] affix.
73082: For @deva[इ] in @deva[मिद्] there is substituted a @deva[गुण] before a @deva[शित्] affix.
73083: Before a personal ending @deva[जुस्] (@deva[उस्]) of the Imperfect, @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final 1. @deva[इ] 2. @deva[ई] 3. @deva[उ]. 4. @deva[ऊ] 5. @deva[ऋ] 6. @deva[ॠ] and 7. @deva[ऌ]।
73084: The @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final @deva[इक्] vowel of a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) before the affixes called @deva[सार्वधातुक] and @deva[आर्धधातुक] -- @deva[तिङ्शित्सार्वधातुकम्] @ref[3.4.113] etc.
73085: The @deva[गुण] is substituted for the @deva[ऋ] of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) @deva[जागृ] , except before the affix @deva[वि] , before the Aorist character (@deva[चिण्]) before the personal ending @deva[णल्] of the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense) and before an affix with an indicatory @deva[ङ्]।
73086: @deva[गुण] is substituted before a @deva[सार्वधातुक] and an @deva[आर्धधातुक] affix for the @deva[इक्] vowels of the Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stems) which take the augment @deva[प्] -- @deva[अर्त्तिह्रीब्लीरीक्नूयीक्ष्माय्यातां] @deva[पुङ्णौ] @ref[7.3.36], and for the short penultimate vowel of a root which ends in a single consonant.
73087: The @deva[गुण] is not substituted for the penultimate light @deva[इक्] vowel in the reduplicated form of a root, before a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a vowel and having an indicatory @deva[प्]।
73088: @deva[भू] and @deva[सु] get not @deva[गुण] before an immediately following personal ending which is @deva[सार्वधातुक] ।
73089: A root ending in short @deva[उ] , which has no Present characteristic (i.e. the @deva[विकरण] is dropped by @deva[लुक्] elision) gets @deva[वृद्धि] before a @deva[पित्] @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a consonant, but not if the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) is reduplicated.
73090: Before a @deva[पित्] @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a consonant, the final @deva[उ] of @deva[ऊर्णु] optionally gets @deva[वृद्धि] ।
73091: Before a @deva[पित्] @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix which is a single consonant, @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final of @deva[ऊर्णु] ।
73092: Before a @deva[पित्] @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a consonant, @deva[इ] is added after @deva[अ] of the verbal stem @deva[तृणह्]।
73093: Before a @deva[पित्] @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a consonant, the augment @deva[इट्] is placed after @deva[ब्रू]।
73094: The @deva[पित्] @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a consonant, optionally get the augment @deva[इट्] in the Intensive.
73095: A @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a consonant, optionally get the augment @deva[इट्] after the roots 1. @deva[तु] 2. @deva[रु] 3. @deva[स्तु] 4. @deva[शम्] and 5. @deva[अम्]।
73096: A single consonantal @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix gets the augment @deva[ईट्] after @deva[अस्] (@deva[अस्ति]) and after the Aorist character @deva[सिच्] ।
73097: In the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas), a single consonantal @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix gets diversely the augment after @deva[अस्] (@deva[अस्ति]) and after the Aorist character @deva[सिच्] ।
73098: After @deva[रुद्] and the four roots that follow it, comes the augment @deva[ईट्] consisting of a single consonant.
73099: According to the opinion of @deva[गार्ग्य] and @deva[गालाव] , the augment @deva[अट्] comes before a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix consisting of single consonant, after the above five roots @deva[रुद्] etc.
73100: After @deva[अद्] 'to eat' , comes the augment @deva[अट्] before a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix consisting of a single consonant, according to the opinion of all grammarians.
73101: The long @deva[आ] is substituted for the final @deva[अ] of a tense @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) before a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix beginning with a @deva[व्] or @deva[म्] (literally a consonant of @deva[यञ्] @deva[प्रत्यहार]).
73102: Before a case-ending beginning with @deva[य्] or @deva[भ्] (literally a consonant of the @deva[यञ्] @deva[प्रत्यहार]) the final of a Nominal-stem is lengthened.
73103: Before a case-ending beginning with @deva[भ्] or @deva[स्] (literally a consonant of the @deva[झल्] @deva[प्रत्यहार]) in the plural, @deva[ए] is substituted for the final @deva[अ] of Nominal-stem.
73104: Before the case-ending @deva[ओस्] , @deva[ए] is substituted for the final @deva[अ] of Nominal-stem.
73105: Before the case-ending @deva[ओस्] and before @deva[आ] of the Instrumental -3rd case, @deva[ए] is substituted for the final @deva[आ] of the feminine affix.
73106: @deva[ए] is substituted for the final @deva[आ] of the feminine affix, in the Vocative Case singular.
73107: A short vowel is substituted in the Vocative Case singular for the final @deva[आ] of the feminine affix, in the sense of 'mother, mother-dear' and also for the long vowel of the feminines called @deva[नदी] -- @deva[यू] @deva[स्त्र्याख्यौ] @deva[नदी] @ref[1.4.3] etc.
73108: For the short @deva[इ] and @deva[उ] final in a nominal-stem, a @deva[गुण] is substituted in the Vocative Case singular.
73109: Before the affix @deva[अस्] of the Nominative 1st-Case plural @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final short vowel of a Nominal-stem.
73110: @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final @deva[ऋ] of a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) in the Locative -7th case singular and in the strong cases.
73111: For the @deva[इ] and @deva[उ] of the stems called @deva[घि] -- @deva[यू] @deva[स्त्र्याख्यौ] @deva[नदी] @ref[1.4.3], @deva[गुण] is substituted in the Dative -4th Case, Ablative -5th case and Genitive 6th-Case singular.
73112: The augment @deva[आट्] is added to the case-endings of the Dative -4th Case, Ablative -5th case and Genitive 6th-Case singular after the stem called @deva[नदी] -- @deva[यू] @deva[स्त्र्याख्यौ] @deva[नदी] @ref[1.4.3] etc.
73113: The augment @deva[याट्] is added to the case-endings of the Dative -4th Case, Ablative -5th case and Genitive 6th-Case singular after a feminine @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in @deva[आ]।
73114: After a Pronominal @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in long @deva[आ] of the feminine, the Dative -4th Case, Ablative -5th case and Genitive 6th-Case singular get the augment @deva[स्याट्] and the @deva[आ] of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) is shortened.
73115: After @deva[द्वितीया] and @deva[तृतीया] the Dative -4th Case, Ablative -5th case and Genitive 6th-Case singular may optionally get the augment @deva[स्याट्] before which the @deva[आ] of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) is shortened.
73116: For the ending @deva[इ] of the Locative -7th case singular there is substituted @deva[आम्] after a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) called @deva[नदी] -- @deva[यू] @deva[स्त्र्याख्यौ] @deva[नदी] @ref[1.4.3] etc., after the feminines in @deva[आ] and after @deva[नी]।
73117: After all the feminine @deva[नदी] -- @deva[यू] @deva[स्त्र्याख्यौ] @deva[नदी] @ref[1.4.3] etc., words ending in a short @deva[इ] and @deva[उ] , @deva[आम्] is substituted for the @deva[इ] of the Locative -7th case singular.
73118: After a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in short @deva[इ] and @deva[उ] and which is not @deva[नदी] -- @deva[यू] @deva[स्त्र्याख्यौ] @deva[नदी] @ref[1.4.3] or @deva[घि] -- @deva[शेषो] @deva[घ्यसखि] @ref[1.4.7], @deva[औ] is substituted for the @deva[इ] of the Locative -7th case singular.
73119: After a @deva[घि] -- @deva[शेषो] @deva[घ्यसखि] @ref[1.4.7], @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) ending in short @deva[इ] or @deva[उ] , @deva[औ] is substituted for the @deva[इ] of the Locative -7th case singular and @deva[अ] is substituted for the final of such a @deva[घि] @deva[अङ्ग] (stem).
73120: @deva[ना] is substituted for the ending @deva[आ] of the Instrumental -3rd case singular, after the @deva[घि] @deva[अङ्ग] (stems) when they are not feminine.
74001: A short is substituted for the vowel, standing in a penultimate position, the Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem), when the affix @deva[चङ्] (sign of the Reduplicate Aorist of the Causatives) follows.
74002: The shortening of the penultimate of the stem, before the causative affix in the reduplicated Aorist, does not take place, when it is a (Denominative) @deva[अङ्ग] (stem), which has lost a simple (end vowel of the Nominal stem) before the Causative sign and also not, when it is the verb @deva[शास्] , or a root which has an indicatory @deva[ऋ]।
74003: The shortening of the penultimate of the Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) in the reduplicated Aorist, is optional in the following - 1. @deva[भ्राज्] 2. @deva[भास्] 3. @deva[भाष्] 4. @deva[दीप्] 5. @deva[जीव्] 6. @deva[मील्] and 7. @deva[पीड्] ।
74004: The penultimate vowel in the Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) @deva[पा] 'to drink' is elided in the Aorist and for the vowel of the reduplicate there is substituted long @deva[ई]।
74005: Short @deva[इ] is substituted for the penultimate vowel of the Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) @deva[स्था] in the Aorist.
74006: Short @deva[इ] is optionally substituted for the penultimate vowel of the Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) of @deva[घ्रा] in the Aorist.
74007: Short @deva[ऋ] is optionally substituted for the penultimate @deva[ऋ] and @deva[ॠ] of a Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) in the reduplicated Aorist.
74008: Short @deva[ऋ] is invariably substituted in the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas) for the penultimate @deva[ऋ] or @deva[ॠ] of a Causative @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) in the reduplicated Aorist.
74009: @deva[दिगि] is substituted for @deva[दे] (@deva[दयते]) in the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
74010: A root ending in short @deva[ऋ] and preceded by a conjunct consonant gets @deva[गुण] in the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
74011: There is @deva[गुण] in the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense) of 1. @deva[ऋच्छ्] 2. @deva[ॠ] and roots ending in long @deva[ॠ]।
74012: In 1. @deva[शॄ] 'to injure' 2. @deva[दॄ] 'to tear' and 3. @deva[पॄ] 'to protect'-- all belonging to @deva[क्र्यादिगणः] (9th Conjugation), the vowel may be optionally shortened in the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
74013: Before the affix @deva[क] the preceding @deva[आ] , @deva[ई] and @deva[ऊ] are shortened.
74014: But before the @deva[समासान्त] affix @deva[कप्] coming after @deva[बहुव्रीहि] @deva[समास] , the @deva[अण्] vowels are not shortened.
74015: Optionally the feminine @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) in @deva[आ] is not shortened before the affix @deva[कप्]।
74016: @deva[गुण] is substituted for the vowel of the root before the affix @deva[अङ्] in the roots ending in @deva[ऋ] or @deva[ॠ] as well as @deva[दृश्] 'to see'.
74017: The @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) @deva[अस्] 'to be' (@deva[अस्यते]) gets the augment @deva[थुक्] before this Aorist @deva[अङ्]।
74018: The @deva[अ] is substituted for the final of @deva[श्वि] in the Aorist @deva[अङ्]।
74019: The augment @deva[प्] is added after the vowel of a root @deva[पत्] 'to fall' in the Aorist @deva[अङ्]।
74020: The augment @deva[उ] is added after the @deva[अ] of @deva[वच्] in the Aorist @deva[अङ्]।
74021: For the vowel of @deva[शी] there is substituted @deva[गुण] when a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix follows.
74022: Before an affix beginning with a @deva[य्] and having an indicatory @deva[क्] or @deva[ङ्] there is substituted @deva[अय्] for the @deva[ई] of @deva[शी]।
74023: The short is substituted for the @deva[ऊ] of @deva[ऊह्] when a preposition precedes it and an affix beginning with @deva[य्] with an indicatory @deva[क्] or @deva[ङ्] follows.
74024: The short is substituted for the vowel of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) @deva[इ] (@deva[एति]) before the augment @deva[यास्] in the Benedictive, when a preposition precedes it.
74025: A long is substituted for the final vowel of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) before an affix beginning with @deva[य्] having an indicatory @deva[क्] or @deva[ङ्] , when it is not a @deva[कृत्] or a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix.
74026: A long is substituted for the final vowel of the @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) before the Adverbial affix @deva[च्वि] -- @deva[अभूततद्भावे] @deva[कृभ्वस्तियोगे] @deva[सम्पद्यकर्तरि] @deva[च्विः] @ref[5.4.50].
74027: @deva[री] is substituted for the final short @deva[ऋ] of a @deva[अङ्ग] (stem) before an affix beginning with @deva[य्] when it is not a @deva[कृत्] or a @deva[सार्वधातुक] affix and the Adverbial affix @deva[च्वि] -- @deva[अभूततद्भावे] @deva[कृभ्वस्तियोगे] @deva[सम्पद्यकर्तरि] @deva[च्विः] @ref[5.4.50].
74028: For the final short @deva[ऋ] of a root, there is substituted @deva[रि] before the present character @deva[अ] (@deva[श]) before the Passive character @deva[य्] and before the augment @deva[यास्] in the Benedictive.
74029: @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final @deva[ऋ] in the root @deva[ऋ] (@deva[अर्ति]) and in those roots ending in @deva[ऋ] in which the vowel is preceded by a conjunct consonant, when the Passive character @deva[यक्] or the Benedictive augment @deva[यास्] follows.
74030: @deva[गुण] is substituted for the final @deva[ऋ] in those roots ending in @deva[ऋ] in which the vowel is preceded by a conjunct consonant, when the Intensive character @deva[यङ्] follows.
74031: Long @deva[ई] is substituted for the vowel of the roots 1. @deva[घ्रा] and 2. @deva[ध्मा] in the Intensive.
74032: Long @deva[ई] is substituted for the final of @deva[अ] or @deva[आ] of a Nominal stem, before the Adverbial affix @deva[च्वि] -- @deva[अभूततद्भावे] @deva[कृभ्वस्तियोगे] @deva[सम्पद्यकर्तरि] @deva[च्विः] @ref[5.4.50]।
74033: Long @deva[ई] is substituted for the final of @deva[अ] or @deva[आ] of a Nominal stem, before the Denominative affix @deva[क्यच्] ।

83097: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] of @deva[स्थ] after 1. @deva[अम्ब] 2. @deva[आम्ब] 3. @deva[गो] 4. @deva[भूमि] 5. @deva[सव्य] 6. @deva[अप] 7. @deva[द्वि] 8. @deva[त्रि] 9. @deva[कु] 10. @deva[शेकु] 11. @deva[शङ्क्वु] 12. @deva[अङ्गु] 13. @deva[मञ्जि] 14. @deva[पुञ्जि] 15. @deva[परमे] 16. @deva[बर्हिस्] 17. @deva[दिवि]  and 18 @deva[अग्नि]।
83098: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] of the words @deva[सुषामान्] etc.
83099: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] when followed by @deva[ए] and preceded by @deva[इण्] or @deva[कु] , when the word is a name and when the @deva[स्] is not preceded by @deva[ग्]।
83100: @deva[ष्] is optionally substituted for the @deva[स्] when the preceding word is the name of a Lunar mansion.
83101: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the final @deva[स्] preceded by a @deva[उ] before a @deva[तद्धित] affix beginning with @deva[त]।
83102: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] of @deva[निस्] before the verb @deva[तप्] when meaning is not that of 'repeatedly making red hot'.
83103: The @deva[स्] standing in the inner half of a stanza is changed to @deva[ष्]  before the @deva[त] of @deva[त्वम्] etc. and @deva[युष्मद्]।
83104: In the opinion of some, the above change takes place in the @deva[यजुर्वेद] also.
83105: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] of @deva[स्तुत] in the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas), in the opinion of some.
83106: In the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas), @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] when it stands in the beginning of a second word, preceded by a word ending in @deva[इ] etc.
83107: In the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas),  @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] of the particle @deva[सु] when preceded by a word having in it the change-effecting letter @deva[इ] etc.
83108: The @deva[स] of the verb @deva[सन्] , when it loses its @deva[न्] is changed to @deva[ष] , under the same circumstances.
83109: @deva[ष्] is substituted for the @deva[स्] of @deva[सह] after @deva[पृतना]  and @deva[ऋत]।
83110: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place if @deva[र्] follows the @deva[स्] as well as in 1. @deva[सृप] 2. @deva[सृज] 3. @deva[स्पृश] 4. @deva[स्पृह]  and 5. @deva[सवन] etc.
83111: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the affix @deva[सात्] and for that @deva[स्] which stands at the beginning of a word.
83112: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the @deva[स्] of @deva[सिच्] of the Intensive.
83113: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the @deva[स्] of the verb @deva[सेध] when the meaning is that of moving.
83115: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the @deva[स्] of @deva[सोढ] form of the root @deva[सह]।
83116: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the reduplicated Aorist of the roots 1. @deva[स्तम्भ्] 2. @deva[सिव्]  and 3. @deva[सह]।
83117: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the @deva[स्] of @deva[सु] (@deva[सुनोति]) in the Future, Conditional and Desiderative.
83118: The @deva[ष्] substitution does not take place in the @deva[स्] of @deva[सद्]  and @deva[ष्वञ्ज्] after the reduplicate in the @deva[लिट्] (Perfect Tense).
83119: The @deva[ष्] is optionally substituted in the @deva[छन्दस्] (Vedas) after the @deva[उपसर्ग] (Prepositions) @deva[नि] , @deva[वि]  and @deva[अभि] when the augment @deva[अट्] intervenes.
84001: After @deva[न्] and @deva[ष्] , the @deva[ण्] is the substitute of @deva[न्] , when they occur as component letters in the same word.
84002: The substitute @deva[ण्] takes the place of @deva[न्] , even when a vowel or @deva[य्] , @deva[व्] , @deva[ह्] or a guttural, or a labial, or the preposition @deva[आ] , or the augment @deva[नुम्] intervenes, causing separation.
84003: So also, @deva[न्] is replaced by @deva[ण्] , when the letter occasioning the substitution, occurs in the first member of a compound, and the whole compound is a Name, provided that the first member does not end with the letter @deva[ग]।
84004: The @deva[न] of @deva[वन] , is changed into @deva[ण] , when preceded by the words @deva[पुरगा] , @deva[मिश्रका] , @deva[सिध्रका] , @deva[शारिका] , @deva[कोटरा] and @deva[अग्रे] , as first members of the compound, and the whole compound is a name.
84005: The @deva[न] of @deva[वन] , is replaced by @deva[ण] , even when the compound is not a Name, when it is preceded by the words @deva[प्र] , @deva[निर्] , @deva[अन्तर] , @deva[शर] , @deva[इक्षु] , @deva[प्लक्ष] , @deva[आम्र] , @deva[कार्ष्य] , @deva[खदिर] and @deva[पीयूक्षा]।
84006: The @deva[न] of @deva[वन] , is optionally replaced by @deva[ण] , when the cause of change occurs in the first member of the compound and which denotes a perennial herb or forest tree.
84007: The @deva[ण] is the substitute of @deva[न] of @deva[अहन्] , when it is preceded by a word ending in @deva[अ] , having in it a letter capable of producing a change.
84008: The @deva[न] of @deva[वाहन] is changed into @deva[ण] , when the letter producing the change, occurs in the first member of a compound, denoting the thing carried.
84009: The @deva[न] of @deva[पान] is changed into @deva[ण] , when occurs as the second member of a compound, the first member of which contains a letter causing change; and the whole compound denotes a country or people.
84010: Optionally when the compound denotes a condition or an instrument, the @deva[न्] of @deva[पान] is changed to @deva[ण] , when it is a second member, the cause of change occurring in the first member in a compound.
84011: Optionally @deva[ण] is substituted for @deva[न] when it stands at the end of a Nominal-stem (@deva[प्रातिपदिक]) or is the augment @deva[नुम्] or is @deva[न] of a case-affix, (when the cause of change occurs in the first member of the compound).
84012: In a compound, the second member of which is a monosyllable, there is @deva[ण] in the room of @deva[न] of the second member, provided that the @deva[न] is at the end of a @deva[प्रातिपदिक] , or is the augment @deva[नुम्] , or occurs in a @deva[विभक्ति]; and when the first member contains a cause of change.
84013: In a compound, the second member of which contains a guttural, there is @deva[ण] in the room of @deva[न] , that follows anything which standing in the prior member is qualified to cause the change, provided the @deva[न] be at the end of a @deva[प्रातिपदिक] , or be the augment @deva[नुम्] , or occur in a @deva[विभक्ति]।
84014: Of a root which has @deva[ण] in its original enunciation, when it comes after a cause of such change standing in an @deva[उपसर्ग] , even though the word be not a @deva[समास] , the @deva[न] is changed to @deva[ण]।
84015: The @deva[न] of @deva[हिनु] and @deva[मीना] is changed to @deva[ण] , when coming after an @deva[उपसर्ग] containing in it a cause of change.
84016: The @deva[न] of @deva[आनि] , the affix of the Imperative, First Person, is changed into @deva[ण] when it follows a letter competent to cause such a change standing in an @deva[उपसर्ग]।
84017: The @deva[ण] is the substitute of @deva[न्] of the prefix @deva[नि] , following a cause for such change standing in an @deva[उपसर्ग] when these words follow - @deva[गद] 'to speak', @deva[नद] 'to be happy', @deva[पत] 'to fall', @deva[पद] 'to go'; the @deva[घु] verbs - @deva[मा] 'to measure', @deva[शो] 'to destroy', @deva[हन्] 'to kill', @deva[या] 'to go', @deva[वा] 'to blow', @deva[द्रा] 'to flee', @deva[प्शा] 'to eat', @deva[वप्] 'to weave', @deva[वह्] 'to bear', @deva[शम्] 'to be tranquil', @deva[चि] 'to collect', and @deva[दिह्] 'to anoint'.
84018: In the remaining verbs, optionally the @deva[न] of @deva[नि] is replaced by @deva[ण] , when it is preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] competent to cause the change; provided that, in the original enunciation, the verb has not an initial @deva[क] or @deva[ख] , nor ends with @deva[ष]।
84019: The @deva[न] of the verb @deva[अन्] 'to breathe', is changed to @deva[ण] , when preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] competent to produce the change.
84020: The @deva[न] of the verb @deva[अन्] 'to breathe', is changed to @deva[ण] , when preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] competent to produce the change, provided it occurs at the end of a @deva[पद]।
84021: Both the @deva[न]-s are changed into @deva[ण] in the reduplicated forms of the verb @deva[अन्] , when preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] competent to cause the change.
84022: The @deva[न] , when preceded by @deva[अ] , in the root @deva[हन्] , is changed to @deva[ण] , when the verb is preceded by a preposition competent to cause the change.
84023: Optionally when @deva[व] or @deva[म] follow, the @deva[न] of @deva[हन्] is changed to @deva[ण] , when preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] competent to cause the change.
84024: The @deva[न] preceded by short @deva[अ] of the root @deva[हन्] is changed into @deva[ण] , when the root follows the @deva[उपसर्ग] - @deva[अन्तर] and the word does not mean 'a country'.
84025: The @deva[न] of @deva[अयन] is changed to @deva[ण] , when preceded by the word @deva[अन्तर्] and the word does not denote a country.
84026: In the @deva[छन्दस्] , @deva[न] of a second term is changed into @deva[ण] , when prior term ends with a short @deva[ऋ] even when there is an @deva[अवग्रह] or hiatus between the two terms.
84027: In the @deva[छन्दस्] , the @deva[न] of (the Pronoun) @deva[नस्] is changed into @deva[ण] , when it comes after a root having a @deva[र] or @deva[ष] or after the words @deva[उरु] and @deva[षु] (@deva[सु])।
84028: The @deva[न] of @deva[नस्] is changed diversely into @deva[ण] , when it comes after an @deva[उपसर्ग] having a cause of change.
84029: The @deva[न] of @deva[कृत्] affix, preceded by a vowel, is changed into @deva[ण] , when it follows an @deva[उपसर्ग] having the cause of change.
84030: The @deva[न] of @deva[कृत्] affix ordained after a causative verb (@deva[णयन्त]), is optionally changed into @deva[ण] , when it comes after an @deva[उपसर्ग] having a cause of change.
84031: The @deva[कृत्] affix, coming after a verb, which begins with a consonant and has a penultimate @deva[इच्] vowel, changes optionally its @deva[न्] , which is preceded by a vowel, into @deva[ण्] , when it comes after @deva[उपसर्ग] having a cause of change.
84032: A @deva[कृत्] affix ordained after a verb beginning with an @deva[इच्] vowel, having the augment @deva[नुम्] in it, and ending with a consonant, changes it s @deva[न्] into @deva[ण्] , when preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] having in it the cause of change.
84033: The @deva[न्] of @deva[निस्] , @deva[निक्ष] and @deva[निन्द] is changed to a @deva[ण] optionally, when preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] having in it a cause of change.
84034: The @deva[न] of a @deva[कृत्] affix is not changed to @deva[ण] , though preceded by an @deva[उपसर्ग] having in it a cause of change, when the affix is added to the following verbs - @deva[भा] 'to shine', @deva[भू] 'to be', @deva[पू] 'to purify', @deva[कमि] 'to be brilliant', @deva[गमि] 'to go', @deva[प्यायि] 'to increase', @deva[वेप] 'to shake'.
84035: After a @deva[ष्] final in a @deva[पद] , the @deva[न्] is not changed to @deva[ण]।
84036: @deva[ण्] is not the substitute of the verb @deva[नश] 'to destroy', when ending in @deva[ष्]।
84037: Of a @deva[न्] final in a @deva[पद] , @deva[ण्] is not the substitute.
84038: The @deva[न्] is not changed to @deva[ण्] when a @deva[पद] intervenes between the cause of the change and the word containing the @deva[न्]।
84039: The @deva[ण्] is not the substitute of @deva[न्] in the words @deva[क्षुभ्ना] etc.
84040: The letters @deva[स्] and the dentals when coming in contact with @deva[श्] and the palatals, are changed to @deva[श्] and palatals respectively.
84041: The letters @deva[स्] and the dentals when coming in contact with @deva[ष्] and the cerebrals, are changed to @deva[ष्] and cerebrals respectively.
84042: After @deva[टु] final in a @deva[पद] , the change of a dental (@deva[स्तु]) to a cerebral (@deva[ष्टु]), does not take place, except in the case of the affix @deva[नाम्]।
84043: In the room of @deva[तु] there is not a cerebral substitute, when @deva[ष्] follows.
84044: In the room of @deva[तु] there is not a palatal substitute, when @deva[श्] precedes.
84045: In the room of a @deva[यर्] letter (every consonant except @deva[ह] final) in a @deva[पद] , when Nasal follows, there is optionally a Nasal substitute.
84046: There is reduplication of @deva[यर्] , i.e. all the consonants except @deva[ह] after the letters @deva[र्] and @deva[ह्] following a vowel.
84047: When a vowel does not follow, there is reduplication of @deva[यर्] (all consonants except @deva[ह]) after a vowel.
84048: There is not reduplication of the letters of @deva[पुत्र] , when the word @deva[आदिनी] follows, the sense being that of reviling or cursing.
84049: There are not two in the room of a sibilant (@deva[शर्]), when a vowel follows.
84050: According to the option of @deva[शाकटायन] , the doubling does not take place when the conjunct consonants are three or more in number.
84051: According to the opinion of @deva[शाकल्य] , there is reduplication no where.
84052: According to the opinion of all the Teachers, there is no doubling after a long vowel.
84053: In the room of @deva[झल्] letters, there is substitution of @deva[जश्] letters, when @deva[झश्] letters follow.
84054: The @deva[चर्] is also substitute of @deva[झल्] letters occurring in a reduplicate syllable, as well as @deva[जश्]।
84055: In the room of @deva[झल्] , there is the substitute @deva[चर्] , when @deva[खर्] follows.
84056: The @deva[चर्] is optionally the substitute of a @deva[झल्] that occurs in a Pause.
84057: The @deva[अनुनासिका] is optionally the substitute of an @deva[अण्] vowel which occurs in a Pause, and is not a @deva[परिगृह्य]।
84058: In the room of @deva[अनुस्वारा], when @deva[यय्] follows, a letter homogenous with the latter is substituted.
84059: In the room of @deva[अनुस्वारा], final in a @deva[पद], the substitution of a letter homogenous with the latter is optional.
84060: In the room of @deva[तु] (a dental) when the letter @deva[ल] follows, one homogenous with the latter is substituted.
84061: After @deva[उद्], in the room of the @deva[स] of @deva[स्था] or @deva[स्तम्भ], the substitute is a letter belonging to the class of the prior (i.e. a dental is substituted for this @deva[स]).
84062: In the room of @deva[ह] after (a sonant Mute) there is optionally a letter homogenous with the prior.
84063: in the room of @deva[श] preceded by a surd Mute, there is optionally the letter @deva[छ्] when a vowel or @deva[य], @deva[व] or @deva[र] follows such @deva[श]।
84064: After a consonant, the following semi-vowel or a nasal is elided optionally, when the same letters follow it
84065: The mute of sibilant (@deva[झर्]) preceded by a consonant and followed by a homogenous mute of sibilant, is optionally elided
84066: The @deva[स्वरित] is the substitute of an @deva[अनुदात्त] vowel which follows an @deva[उदात्त] vowel.
84067: All prohibit the above substitution of @deva[स्वरित], except the @deva[आचार्याः] - @deva[गार्ग्य], @deva[काश्यप] and @deva[गाल्व]; when an @deva[उदात्त] or a @deva[स्वरित] follows.
84068: The @deva[अ] which was considered to be open (@deva[विवृत]) in all the preceding operations of the Grammar, is now made contracted (@deva[संवृत])
